thoughts: Wants to start trouble for c_n
Just wanted to make c_n stronger
Disapproves of c_n's relationships with the other Clans
Thinks that a war would make c_n stronger
Is solving problems with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws, not {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} voice
Keeps whispering odd things to other Dark Forest cats
Realizes old habits are hard to drop when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/try/tries} to stop a fight from breaking out
Watches an argument escalate into a fight with keen interest
Is glad to be free of c_n's responsibilities
Thinks about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clanmates and all of the dumb arguments {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} had to fix
Tries to dream about true glory for c_n
Tries to use {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tongue more than {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws to get {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way
Can sometimes convince others to give {PRONOUN/m_c/object} whatever {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} want
